commits.message:
feat(GOC-3221): Add streamlined QA review command package (#60119)

Create comprehensive visual regression testing and custom test scenario execution
command for HelloFresh web applications using Chrome DevTools MCP integration.

Key Features:
- Visual regression testing with screenshot comparison and responsive validation
- Custom test scenarios with natural language step parsing
- Chrome DevTools MCP automation with Playwright fallback
- Automated browser process cleanup to prevent resource accumulation
- Brand/country switching via HelloFresh dev tools panel integration
- Organized as comprehensive package with detailed documentation

Technical Implementation:
- Command package located in .cursor/commands/qa-review/
- Supports visual and custom test types with flexible parameters
- Integrates with existing HelloFresh testing infrastructure
- Full TypeScript support with proper command parameter typing
- Comprehensive documentation with usage examples and best practices

[Cursor_Code]
commits.author: Himash Tehan
